org.qi4j.api.unitofwork.concern
Annotation Type UnitOfWorkRetry

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=METHOD)
@Inherited
@Documented
public @interface UnitOfWorkRetry

This annotation describes the retries that should occur in case of ConcurrentEntityModificationException occurs.

Optional Element Summary
 long delayFactory
           
 long initialDelay
           
 int retries
           
 

retries

public abstract int retries
Default:
1

initialDelay

public abstract long initialDelay
Default:
0L

delayFactory

public abstract long delayFactory
Default:
10L
